org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield
Class VanDerWaalsInteractions

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.VanDerWaalsInteractions

public class VanDerWaalsInteractions
extends java.lang.Object

Van Der Waals Interactions calculator for the potential energy function. Include function and derivatives.

Author:
vlabarta
Created on:
February 17, 2005
Belongs to CDK module:
forcefield
